tables.table: create table package ( id bigint not null identity, metric varchar(10) not null, quantity decimal not null, primary key (id) )
create table ingredient ( id bigint not null identity, name varchar(255) not null, primary key (id) )

create table ingredient_package ( id bigint not null identity, package_id bigint not null foreign key references package(id), ingredient_id bigint not null foreign key references ingredient(id), price decimal, primary key (id), constraint UC_IP UNIQUE (ingredient_id, package_id) )
create table recipe ( id bigint not null identity, name varchar(255) not null, price decimal not null default 0, primary key (id) )

create table recipe_ingredient ( id bigint not null identity, recipe_id bigint not null foreign key references recipe(id), ingredient_id bigint not null foreign key references ingredient_package(id), quantity_used decimal not null, price decimal not null, primary key (id) )
